designs.name: Modern Fashion Apparel Store
designs.description: Clean, stylish retail space highlighting apparel collections clearly
designs.flooring: Large-format vitrified tiles or polished concrete
designs.walls: Neutral walls with accent display panels
designs.prompt_keywords: modern apparel store, fashion retail interior, clean clothing showroom

designs.name: Luxury Boutique Apparel Store
designs.description: Premium boutique showcasing high-end fashion collections
designs.walls: Textured panels with gold or brass accents
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury apparel boutique, premium fashion store interior

designs.name: Minimal Chic Apparel Store
designs.description: Sleek and clutter-free retail space focusing on product simplicity
designs.prompt_keywords: minimal apparel store, chic fashion retail design

designs.name: Industrial Urban Apparel Store
designs.description: Raw urban clothing store with bold industrial aesthetics
designs.prompt_keywords: industrial apparel store, urban fashion retail

designs.name: High-Street Fashion Store
designs.description: Fast-fashion retail space designed for high footfall
designs.prompt_keywords: high street apparel store, fast fashion retail interior

designs.name: Boho Boutique Apparel Store
designs.description: Artistic boutique ideal for ethnic or handcrafted clothing
designs.prompt_keywords: boho apparel boutique, ethnic clothing store interior

designs.name: Scandinavian Light Apparel Store
designs.description: Bright and airy fashion store with Scandinavian aesthetics
designs.prompt_keywords: scandinavian apparel store, light fashion retail

designs.name: Tech Futuristic Apparel Store
designs.description: High-tech fashion store with digital retail experience
designs.prompt_keywords: futuristic apparel store, smart fashion retail

designs.name: Brand Story Apparel Store
designs.description: Retail space designed to showcase brand identity and journey
designs.prompt_keywords: brand focused apparel store, storytelling retail design

designs.name: Budget Functional Apparel Store
designs.description: Cost-effective retail layout focused on efficiency
designs.prompt_keywords: budget apparel store, functional clothing retail
